inclusion.criterion: WHO class I -IV (mPAP ≥ 25 mm Hg, pulmonary arterial occlusion pressure ≤15 mm Hg)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: stable on optimized pharmacological treatment for at least six weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: men and women 18 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient is diagnosed with Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension (World Health Organization (WHO) Category Group 1)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patient has a stable functional class of PAH with no changes of medication during the trial
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: significant left heart disease, requiring acute pharmacological or interventional treatment
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
